actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on medical devices.

summary.text: Protect Medical Innovation Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the excise tax on medical device manufacturers and importers.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on medical devices.
